name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in creating high-performance web applications using **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, and **GraphQL**. Proficient in modern frontend technologies including **Contentful**, **Material UI**, **Tailwind**, as well as testing frameworks like **Jest** and **React Testing Library**. Skilled in utilizing **Cypress** for end-to-end testing and optimizing build processes with **Webpack** and **Vite**. I have a solid track record in delivering scalable solutions, utilizing cloud services such as **AWS** and deploying via **Vercel**.

In addition to my frontend expertise, I have substantial experience in backend technologies, including **FastAPI** and **Django**, which supports my comprehensive understanding of full-stack development. My strong foundation in agile methodologies, including CI/CD processes, allows me to efficiently manage project timelines while ensuring code quality and compliance with industry standards. I am adept at collaborating cross-functionally to build user-centric interfaces that enhance overall user experience.
